DOC.brief_summary: Randomized trial compare lumbar plexus catheter versus femoral nerve catheter ( single-shot femoral block control group ) postoperative pain control anterior cruciate ligament repair child ( age 11-21 ) . Primary outcome pain score first 72 hour . Secondary outcome include opioid consumption , incidence opioid side effect quality recovery ( previously validate scale ) . Our hypothesis lumbar plexus catheter provide superior pain control overall quality recovery compare femoral nerve catheter .
